item.title: Doctors are concerned over ivermectin's renewed popularity
item.description: Ivermectin's reputation keeps growing as a kind of cure-all, even for cancer — despite evidence it doesn't work.

item.title: In a year of steep challenges, there were still shining moments in global health
item.description: The Trump administration's deep cuts in U.S. foreign health aid had a devastating impact. Yet there were achievements of note in spite of it all.

item.title: After Outpatient Cosmetic Surgery, They Wound Up in the Hospital or Alone at a Recovery House
